args: Now they're coming from this side!
There's no end to these things!
Keep fighting! We have to save the village!
Besides, ain't you the one what was\nstruttin' around earlier talkin' about\nhow easy this was gonna be?
Yeah, yeah, I know. ...Okay, then.\nI said I'd do it, so I'm gonna do it!
Time for a Luca special. Eat this, fiends!
You took out two at once!\nPretty impressive, Luca.
That wasn't me. My bow's still nocked.
But whoever they are, they have some\nSERIOUS bow skills. I don't think I\ncould make a shot like that.
Oh, I don't know about that. I've seen\nyou make some pretty impossible shots.
Sure, but look at where the arrows pierced\nthese two—straight through the heart,\nboth of 'em. That's one in a million.
I mean, yeah, I could probably make a shot\nlike that, but not without a lot of luck.
Okay, now I owe this mystery archer\na HUGE thank you!
You two all right over there?
We're fine—but I think I owe you a dinner.\nOr maybe THREE dinners, considering\nhow many fiends you just took out.
Not necessary; I'm just glad you're...
SARISSE?! What are YOU doing here?!
Luca's little sister, yes. We met her\nback at their village.
It's great to see you again, Sarisse,\nbut what are you doing here?
Oh, I'm just out on a little fiend hunt.\nThe same villagers who asked you for\nhelp also wanted me to pitch in.
Now THAT'S a piece of encouragin' news!\nRight, {player_name}?
If she's as good as those last two shots,\nshe'll be an incredible asset.
Okay, everybody just slow your rolls!\nDon't I get a say in this?
Er, why would your say not be ＂yes＂?
Because this is my little SISTER, man!\nExterminating fiends is dangerous work.
Yeah, but you were JUST goin' on and on\nabout how skilled this mystery archer\nperson was!
Was I, though? No, I don't think so.\nIt was more of a head-nod, ＂yeah,\nI guess that was okay＂ kind of thing.
Luca called me skilled? Woohoo!\nYou finally recognized my ability!
I said those things in the heat of the\nmoment! Now, after careful reflection,\nit's clear that I was over-effusive.
Regardless, there's no WAY I'm letting\nyou chase around a bunch of fiends!
But you said I was skilled!
I know you too well. You're looking at\nthis like some game to test your skills.\nIf you go into combat thinking like that...
Now hold on! When did I say anything like\nthat? I'm taking my fiend-hunting duties\ncompletely seriously!
Listen, I get that you guys have this\nsibling mind-meld thing goin' on, but—
But yer startin' to attract an audience!
Okay, fine. You can help us, Sarisse.\nBut JUST this one time, got it?!
You have to be kidding me.
See? I knew she'd be thrilled!\n...Wait, what did you say?
I said that you're an IDIOT, Luca!\nFirst you treat me like a useless kid,\nand now you want my HELP?!
I'm just trying to keep you safe!
And I'M just trying to help people!\nWhat's so wrong with that?
Well...okay, yeah that's not a bad reason...
Look, all I'm saying is that you should have\ntalked to me about this before you just\nran off and started arrowing fiends.
I can decide how to live my own life,\nthank you very much!
Sarisse, wait! Don't go running off!
I'm going to kill every last fiend here!\nMaybe THEN you'll admit I know what\nthe heck I'm doing!
Stay the hell away from my sister! Haaah!
Luca! You saved meeeeeee...um...a tiny\nbit of trouble. Yep! That's all you did.
Still, I SUPPOSE we can call it even for\nme saving you earlier—even though I\ndid that, like, three times.
I'm sorry, Sarisse. This is all my fault.
I owe you an apology. I totally disregarded\nyour feelings, and that was wrong.
Yeah. But I also wanna say one thing...
It makes me CRAZY when you just go\nrunning off into danger like that!
You were that worried about me...
I'm sorry, too. I shouldn't have just run off\nand started plunking fools like that.
Woah, look at the size of this fella.\nIt must be their leader.
C'mon, Luca! We'll take it down together!
Time to show 'em what we can do!
Told ya you two had a sibling mind-meld.
But yeah, there was something different\nabout that shot we did just now, right?\nSomething amazing!
That's what happens when you fight\nalongside someone.
Well, in that case, I'm coming with you,\n{player_name}!
We'd love your help! Er, but what do you\nthink about all this, Luca?
Hey, now that you've learned how to\nwork with others, I'm fine with it.\nYou're really growing up, Sis!
Those stupid fiends aren't gonna know\nwhat hit 'em!
